ValidationRule.description: In order to link Partner Users, the Salesforce Account must first be linked to a Oracle CPQ Cloud Partner Organization. To do this, enter the variable name of the partner organization in the "Oracle CPQ Cloud Partner Organization" field on the account.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to link to a Oracle CPQ Cloud Partner User, this Salesforce User must be tied to an Account that is mapped to a Partner Organization in Oracle CPQ Cloud. Please consult with your System administrator for further details.
